description:
Crafted from sustainably minded materials, these waterproof leather boots delivers the style and comfort Timberland is known for.Uppers are fabric and leather from a tannery rated Silver or higher by The Leather Working Group. Tanneries are assessed based on energy use, waste production and water treatment.ReBOTL recycled fabric wicks moisture away from the foot.TimberDry™ waterproof breathable membrane is made from 50% post-consumer recycled material.Aggressive tread helps keep you anchored.To date Timberland has re-purposed more 445 metric tons of plastic waste in their products.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content









                      Leather Working Group leather
name: Timberland Premium 6" Waterproof Rebotl Boots - Women's
